topic.title: How to Force a Page Break Before or After a Topic or Other Element

body.p:
Mark the topic (or other element you need to control page breaking around) with an outputclass having one of these values:
page-break-before Use this for a page break before the marked element
page-break-after Use this for a page break after the marked element
page-break-avoid Use this for avoiding page breaks inside the marked element.
